item.text: Then Joseph hugged his father’s face. He wept over him and kissed him.

<st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="06680" class="">instructed</st> the <st data-num="07495" class="">physicians</st> in his <st data-num="05650" class="">service</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="02590" class="">embalm</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, so the <st data-num="07495" class="">physicians</st> <st data-num="02590" class="">embalmed</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.
They took 40 days, for that is the full time needed for embalming. The Egyptians mourned for him 70 days.
When the days of mourning had passed, Joseph said to Pharaoh’s royal court, “If I have found favor in your sight, please say to Pharaoh,

‘My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> made me <st data-num="07650" class="">swear an oath</st>. He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="02009" class="">about to</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>. <st data-num="06912" class="">Bury</st> me<n id="2" /> in my <st data-num="06913" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="03738" class="">dug</st> for myself <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st>.” <st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="04994" class="">let</st> me <st data-num="05927" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="06912" class="">bury</st> my <st data-num="01" class="">father;</st> then I will <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>.’”
So Pharaoh said, “Go and bury your father, just as he made you swear to do.”
So Joseph went up to bury his father; all Pharaoh’s officials went with him—the senior courtiers of his household, all the senior officials of the land of Egypt,

<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>, his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, and his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>. <st data-num="07535" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="05800" class="">left</st> their <st data-num="02945" class="">little children</st> and their <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st> and <st data-num="01241" class="">herds</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="01657" class="">Goshen</st>.
Chariots and horsemen also went up with him, so it was a very large entourage.

When they came to the threshing floor of Atad on the other side of the Jordan, they mourned there with very great and bitter sorrow. There Joseph observed a seven-day period of mourning for his father.

When the Canaanites who lived in the land saw them mourning at the threshing floor of Atad, they said, “This is a very sad occasion for the Egyptians.” That is why its name was called Abel Mizraim, which is beyond the Jordan.
So the sons of Jacob did for him just as he had instructed them.

His <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">carried</st> him to the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st> and <st data-num="06912" class="">buried</st> him in the <st data-num="04631" class="">cave</st> of the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> of <st data-num="04375" class="">Machpelah</st>, <st data-num="05921 06440">near</st> <st data-num="04471" class="">Mamre</st>. <st data-num="0834" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="07069" class="">purchased</st> as a <st data-num="06913" class="">burial</st> <st data-num="0272" class="">plot</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> <st data-num="06085" class="">Ephron</st> the <st data-num="02850" class="">Hittite</st>.
After he buried his father, Joseph returned to Egypt, along with his brothers and all who had accompanied him to bury his father.
When Joseph’s brothers saw that their father was dead, they said, “What if Joseph bears a grudge and wants to repay us in full for all the harm we did to him?”

So they <st data-num="06680" class="">sent word</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “Your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="06680 0559">gave</st> these <st data-num="06680 0559">instructions</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> he <st data-num="04194" class="">died</st>:

‘<st data-num="0559" class="">Tell</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="03541" class="">this</st>: <st data-num="0577 04994">Please</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">forgive</st> the <st data-num="06588" class="">sin</st> of your <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> and the <st data-num="02403" class="">wrong</st> they did <st data-num="03588" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="01580" class="">treated</st> you so <st data-num="07451" class="">badly</st>.’ <st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="04994" class="">please</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">forgive</st> the <st data-num="06588" class="">sin</st> of the <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> of the <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> of your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>.” When this message was <st data-num="01696" class="">reported</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="01058" class="">wept</st>.<n id="1" />

Then his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="05307" class="">threw</st> themselves <st data-num="06307" class="">down</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> him; they <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Here</st> we are; we are your <st data-num="05650" class="">slaves</st>.”

But <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="0559 0413">answered</st> them, “<st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">be afraid</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">Am</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">in the place of</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>?

As for <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, you <st data-num="02803" class="">meant</st> to <st data-num="05921 07451">harm</st> me,<n id="1" /> but <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="02803" class="">intended</st> it for a <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">purpose</st>, <st data-num="04616" class="">so</st> he could <st data-num="02421" class="">preserve the lives</st> of <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, as you can see <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.<n id="2" />
So now, don’t be afraid. I will provide for you and your little children.” Then he consoled them and spoke kindly to them.
Joseph lived in Egypt, along with his father’s family. Joseph lived 110 years.
Joseph saw the descendants of Ephraim to the third generation. He also saw the children of Makir the son of Manasseh; they were given special inheritance rights by Joseph.
Then Joseph said to his brothers, “I am about to die. But God will surely come to you and lead you up from this land to the land he swore on oath to give to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob.”

<st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> made the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="07650" class="">swear an oath</st>. He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="06485" class="">surely</st> <st data-num="06485" class="">come to</st> you. Then you must <st data-num="05927" class="">carry</st> my <st data-num="06106" class="">bones</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> from <st data-num="02088" class="">this place</st>.”
So Joseph died at the age of 110. After they embalmed him, his body was placed in a coffin in Egypt.
